name: Eggy
description: The little chick stays in its shell for a while after hatching. It feeds on little insects that crawl nearby.

name: Birdactyl
description: As the shell grows small, the fletchling becomes more confident. It hunt smaller critters, threatening them with its claws.

name: Crustavian
description: Mastering flight, surface and water, it fights everything and anything that comes within its territory. Its punch is strong enough to knockout an Indian elephant.

name: Sparksmall
description: This little guy floats from power source to power source. It feeds on energy to grow big and strong.

name: Plugfey
description: After consuming large amounts of energy, it plugs its tendrils into the ground. This behavour is theorised to help with digestion.

name: Titantricity
description: Titantricity roams the fields around powerlines. This hungry monster is often the cause of power outages in towns.

name: Spidorby
description: Spidorbies harmlessly wander around forests hoping to stumble into food. When threatened, they roll away in panic.

name: Websacc
description: Its shell is made of thick web. While it hibernates, its internal temperature reaches as high as 100 degrees.

name: Pyrantula
description: It builds elaborate webs around the outskirts of forests. After starting a fire, it hopes the prey will get trapepd in the webs while trying to escape.

name: Skulemu
description: It kept its consciousness after death, but could not move without its body. It used short-term possesion of smaller critters to reassemble its skeleton.

name: Cybostrich
description: Genetic research has allowed to have its body regenerated based on its memories. Cyborg parts allow it to move slowly in the meantime.

name: Rheafetherd
description: After reconstruction, the dinosaur has gained immense speed. It enjoys testing its speed by chasing Indian elephants.

name: Clodsoil
description: Clodsoil moves around dirt, absorbing nutriens as it goes. Sometimes it eats the grass growing on it as well.

name: Earthclump
description: It can merge with earth below it to maneuver around quickly. The flower on its head is part of its nervous system.

name: Subterrchomp
description: To a naked eye, this creature looks like a small hill. It waits for unsuspecting prey to approach before eating it whole.

name: Nitrotod
description: This mysterious lizard scurries at night eating bolts. It squirts ligth blue liquid from its eyes for protection.

name: Skinkbolt
description: This creature instantly extends its neck to reach far away targets. The metal coat covering its throat can sustain a lot of damage.

name: Basilength
description: Despite being made of steel, it can float effortlessly in the air. Its iron will also allows it to survive in space.

name: Quatrap
description: The four heads are efficient at multitasking. One baits critters with nectar, other fights off predators, and the final two eat dirt for nutrients.

name: Misigil
description: This rocky creature absorbs all nearby misfortune. It tricks other creatures into an unwinnable game to aggrevate them and feed on their strong anger.

name: Ghamblegoul
description: Ghamblegoul invites weaker souls for some light-hearted bets. After a few deliberate losses, it ramps up to win the other player's soul in a rigged fashion.

name: Umbrams
description: This critter moves around using its spectral limbs. The stronger its soul, the more arms it can have.

name: Clayball
description: The everchanging eyball flies across the skies at immense speeds. Ancient folk used to worship this monster, dubbing it "Spirit of Flight".

name: Deflatoon
description: This critter assumes an appearanece of a discarded balloon. It feeds on trash after being thrown away when mistaken for litter.

name: Elecflate
description: It's body is full of electrified air. Touching it just once will make the victim experience static shocks for hours.

name: Vensap
description: The little sprout needs to eat three times its weight in a day. It hops around, using all of its strength to lift its pot.

name: Plexgraft
description: None of the heads have a mind of its own. Their brains have merged into one inside of the reinforced pot.

name: Catirpath
description: The tiny Catirpath spends most of its day eating leaves and sleeping. It doesn't know a parasite resides within in.

name: Parastingd
description: Feeling disturbances from inside, the bug fruitlessly tries to drive its parasite away. This leaves it in a scarred state.

name: Outburstingd
description: After reaching maturity, the parasite roams freely, abandoning its host. It's toxic is potent enough to make an Indian elephant suffer.

name: Cocoore
description: In an effort to fight off its disease, the bug develops a powerful psychic-based immune system. It's mental powers are fighting to defeat the parasite once and for all.

name: Curemoth
description: The powder produced by this monster have potent healing qualities. A concoction brewed from it can make a sickly Indian elephant healthy again.

name: Choiceprit
description: The creature seems to keep track of something on its rocky body. It's very conflicted on the role of luck in its life.

name: Tyranoplush
description: This doll looks to be based on a dinosaur with wings. It chases off critters away from its home trash bin.

name: Divanosaurus
description: It ate so much it is now square. An Indian elephant could sit on it comfortably.

name: Snario
description: This shiny creature lies motionless in grass. It waits for a curios critter to approach it before snaring it with its ghastly claws.

name: Betsoul
description: This ghastly critter enjoys challenge. It eagerly bets its own food to see if it can do better than its rivals.

name: Airbastrike
description: The flame that lifts this monster is its very own soul. It flies high enough, then drops on its target trying to crush them.

name: Stitchspook
description: This ghost lives in a toy long abandoned by its owner. It prefers to stick around landfills.

name: Twirlead
description: This critters seems to be cosntantly spinning in place. This tactic could disorient predators.

name: Spinneron
description: The friction is creates from spinning can start a fire. Wherever it goes, it leaves a burning trail behind it.

name: Stahldance
description: This monster does elaborate spinny dances to distract its enemies. Those mesmerised by its motion tend to not notice being engulfed in flames.

name: Ghostingd
description: The soul of the bug persists within the husk after the parasite has long left. The wings it creates out of pure malice are frequently used for devastating cuts.

name: Huscure
description: The parasite's soul that once lived in the bug now resides within this husk. It uses its wings created from its gratitude for a second chance for life to protect weaker creatures.

name: Earthquartz
description: This monster is filled with anxiety. It trembles in fear and the area around it shakes noticeably.

name: Gazeblaze
description: The creature sits lazily on the ground as absorbs minerals from the soil. Those observing it always see it staring back.

name: Silliscorch
description: Its rocky carapace keeps protects its mostly liquid innards. The hand-tail sticks itself to objects of interest by melting into them slightly.

name: Cragmarin
description: The smaller the specimen is, the more energy it keeps. A controlled explosion by this monster can wipe out a small population of Indian elephants.

name: Eyetum
description: These dragons pace around caves looking for crystals to eat. Their stomach appears to act as a massive eye as well.

name: Ocularge
description: A diet of rare rocks made it grow a crystal on its back. The spiny skin it has makes other creatures avoid touching it.

name: Cyclash
description: The superior vision on its stomach eye makes this monster prefer using it for sight. A strike with its tentacles can leave a mark on an Indian elephant for two weeks.

name: Unicardic
description: Interestingly, the heart of this creature is made of a single cell. It subtly manipulates moisture around itself to create a gooey layer of protection.

name: Dicelluar
description: Its unique celluar structure gives it a bizarre ability to survive in the most hostile environments. Its keen sense of smell allows it to locate the sneakiest of Indian elephants.

name: Panmoeba
description: Panmoeba's heart is a complex creature in its own right. It grew legs in order to leg it in case it's slime exterior is removed in some way.

name: Centuriworm
description: Centuriworm's carapce slightly resembles a tank. The marshes it patrols are usually empty as its presence drives the local fauna away.

name: Scorpright
description: This critter shines dimly in the dark. A group of them communicates by adjusting its brightness slightly.

name: Dazzletaur
description: Dazzletaurs live in small tribes in deserts. Their skin's brightness is strong enough to blind an Indian elephant.

name: Arachlit
description: This monster lives deep inside caves. Many missing miners are presumed to have mistaken its bright scales for an exit.

name: Koshmare
description: Koshmare is a hypothetical creatrue not yet confirmed to exist. There is a large amount of consistent reports of it being sighted in dreams, but any attempt to track it down did not yield results.

name: Clawmaton
description: This creature scuttles around scrapyards looking for bolts to eat. It can use its claws to strike with surgical percision.

name: Crabrage
description: Crabrage spends most of its time actively looking for a fight. It will go after any Indian elephant that looks at it the wrong way.

name: Geysurge
description: This curious critter pokes its head out of the ground looking for food. In winter it sometimes freezes over, making a nice looking ice pillar.

name: Squallie
description: This monster lives in the sea, creating massive waves capturing nearby sealife into its grasp. You can tell it's nearby if it inexplicably starts raining.

name: Stuffosaurus
description: After growing big and strong, this creature finally leaves its adopted trash filled home. It now roams the fields among Indian elephants.

name: Shadesurfer
description: Despite its size, it can effortlessly dive into the shade realm and travel along the shadows. The multiple eyes on its body are always alert, even when sleeping.

name: Spiritwig
description: It lives in dense forests overlooking an area. If a small creature approaches a predator's territory, it will start rustling its leaves to scare them away.

name: Forestnight
description: It patrols the skies above the forest, scanning for any disturbances. If it sense a threat to the environment, it will attack the offender.
